QuestData.Title: Hands-Off Operation
QuestData.Description:
Qalashi dustbinders are trying to imprison our whelps. It seems their leader is planning to use them for some nefarious purpose. We cannot let this happen!
But the djaradin are not the only enemy here. Phoenixes are also tracking our whelps, presenting even more danger.
You must protect the the whelps and eliminate the enemies that threaten them. Osoria will assist you.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: A dangerous opponent, skilled in the manipulation of ash and soot.
QuestData.LogDescription: Save $1oa Endangered Whelps while eliminating $2oa Searclaw Phoenixes and Ashbinder Tornecha.
